MMU conrtoller.

============================================================================

Function:
OMAP3530_halMmuCtrl
Parameters:
halObj. Pointer to HAL object.
cmd. Command.
memTable Memory Table.
memEntries. Number of entries in memTable.
mmuInfo Control information for mapping.
Returns:
DSP_SOK Operation successfully completed. DSP_ECONFIG Configuration error. DSP_EINVALIDARG An invalid argument was specified. DSP_ERANGE Invalid range for dynamic entry. DSP_SEXISTS Enrty exists.
Precondition:
None.
Postcondition:
None.
